name: Birth Anniversary of Lala Lajpat Rai
Shaheed Diwas - Shri Bhagat Singh, Shri Sukhdev, Shri Rajguru
Birthday of Shaheed Bhagat Singh Ji
Gandhi Jayanti - International Day of Non-Violence
Birthday of Guru Ram Das (Nanakshahi calendar)
World White cane day(guiding the blind)
International Day for the Eradication of Poverty
National Solidarity Day (China attacked India on that day)
Rastriya Ekta Diwas /National Unity Day(Sardar Patel)
Martyrdom Of Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib (Nanakshahi calendar)
